description: This file implements the HttpClient class, providing functionalities for initializing a cURL handle, downloading files via HTTP, handling progress updates, and cleaning up resources. It includes methods like downloadFile, progressCb, and write_data.

classes.name: HttpClient
classes.description: A class that encapsulates HTTP operations such as file download using cURL, managing request progress, and cleanup.

methods.name: HttpClient()
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the cURL handle and logs the initialization status.

methods.name: ~HttpClient()
methods.description: Destructor that cleans up the cURL handle if it was initialized.

methods.name: HttpClient::Status downloadFile(const std::string & url,const std::string & fileName,uint32_t rateLimit)
methods.description: Downloads a file from the specified URL to a local filename with an optional rate limit, handling errors and logging.

methods.name: size_t progressCb(void * ptr,double dltotal,double dlnow,double ultotal,double ulnow)
methods.description: Callback for tracking download progress, updating the progress percentage.

methods.name: size_t write_data(void * ptr,size_t size,size_t nmemb,FILE * stream)
methods.description: Callback for writing received data to a file during download.

ctags.name: downloadFile
ctags.pattern: /^HttpClient::downloadFile(const std::string & url, const std::string & fileName, uint32_t rateLim/

ctags.name: progressCb
ctags.pattern: /^size_t HttpClient::progressCb(void *ptr, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ultotal, double ul/

ctags.name: write_data
ctags.pattern: /^size_t HttpClient::write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, FILE *stream) {$/
